name: Best Faculty
description: The Quran courses academy has professional teachers who can communicate in Arabic and English fluently, making sure that communication and learning is effective.

name: Kids with care
description: Learning at a young age provides the foundation to build upon prior knowledge and the ability to learn more as you go. The subject can be irrelevant but what is important is framing the young mind into exploring their curiosity. This can then be translated into the applicable world.

name: Learn Tajweed
description: Tajweed Course is for those who can read the Quran but dont know Tajweed. In simple lessons, you will learn basics of tajweed along with many tips and tricks to remember the rules of recitaion.

name: Learn Hifz
description: The main objective of the Hifz program is to develop love and respect of the Qur’an to the extent that the student loves to memorize, recite, understand, ponder, implement, and propagate the message; or in other words, make it a book of guidance.

name: Individual Shift's
description: The main objective of the Hifz program is to develop love and respect of the Qur’an to the extent that the student loves to memorize, recite, understand, ponder, implement, and propagate the message; or in other words, make it a book of guidance.
